DOC.brief_summary: This randomise trial compare efficacy 3 different analgesic strategy newborns prostaglandin ductus dependent congenital heart disease .
DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Strategies Newborns Receiving Prostaglandin Therapy
DOC.criteria: Fullterm newborn Under one month age With ductus dependent congenital heart disease require prostaglandin infusion elevate pain score Contraindication either morphine , acetaminophen , nalbuphine Other painful condition Poor neurological condition Cardiac instability require urgent surgery
